sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Two sermons preached at Paules-Crosse London The one November 21. the other Aprill 15. 1627. By Robert Saunderson, Bachelour in Divinitie, and sometimes Fellow of Lincolne Colledge in Oxford. Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.
[6], 128 p.
Printed by B. A[lsop] and T. F[awcet] for Robert Dawlman, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1628.
Printers' names from STC. On Tim. iv.4 and Gen. xx.6. A variant of the edition with "Dolman" in the imprint. First sermon published in 1624--Folger Shakespeare Library catalogue. Errata on A3v. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[6], 128 p.
Printed by B. A[lsop] and T. F[awcet] for Robert Dawlman, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1628.
Printers' names from STC. On Tim. iv.4 and Gen. xx.6. A variant of the edition with "Dolman" in the imprint. First sermon published in 1624--Folger Shakespeare Library catalogue. Errata on A3v. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
